title: Start
body:
Ivory: Hey, long time no see.
Ivory: Just kidding.
Ivory: How about gin and tonic this time?

title: GetNotDrink1
body:
<<set $rightdrink to 2>>

Ivory: Okay, I know you're new, but that's kind of fucked up, man.
Ivory: Guess I'll leave now...
Ivory: Fuck me for ending up here every time.
Ivory: Bye.
